snippet: Lizette Salas and Jessica Korda, two Americans chasing the Kraft Nabisco Championship 54-hole leader, Inbee Park, are proof that there is more than one way to raise a professional golfer.
abstract: Profiles of American golfers Lizette Salas and Jessica Korda, whose fathers have been a large part of their success; Salas is second at the Kraft Nabisco Championship, and Korda is tied for third.
lead_paragraph: Lizette Salas and Jessica Korda, two Americans chasing the Kraft Nabisco Championship 54-hole leader, Inbee Park, are proof that there is more than one way to raise a professional golfer.

headline.seo: Lizette Salas and Jessica Korda on the Way to a Major
headline.main: Two Child-Rearing Stories on the Way to a Major
headline.print_headline: Two Child-Rearing Stories On the Way to a Major
